titles.title: Designating certain minority membership on certain standing committees of the House.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 5/27/1993--Introduced. Elects the following Representatives to the House committees named: (1) Smith (of Michigan) and Everett to Agriculture; (2) Bentley, Taylor, and Torkildsen to Merchant Marine and Fisheries; and (3) Stearns and King to Veterans Affairs.
